description: This file provides a React component called 'Markdown' that renders minimal markdown content with support for code blocks, bold, italic, inline code, and line breaks. It includes an internal parser for handling markdown syntax into React elements.

methods.name: parseMarkdown
methods.description: Parses markdown string input into an array of React nodes, handling code blocks and inline markdown syntax like bold, italic, and inline code.

methods.name: Markdown
methods.description: React functional component that renders markdown content by parsing it with 'parseMarkdown' and converting parsed nodes into React elements with styling and interactive features.
